header.description: Invoice header with company/vendor info, client details, invoice metadata, and remarks

rows.description: Line items with description, quantity, unit price, and total

totals.description: Financial summary: subtotal, discount, tax, shipping, and balance due

semantics: No parameters required. Report displays invoice header, line items, and totals. Unresolved fields (company contact info, shipping) require data source updates or user input.
transformations: Compute subtotal_less_discount as subtotal minus discount
Compute tax_rate as (tax_amount / subtotal) * 100, formatted as percentage
Aggregate subtotal as SUM of line_total
Join invoices to customers via customer_id for client details
Join invoices to invoice_items via invoice_number for line items
